name: Lovely Ghost Minnie
description:
First of all, thank you so much for checking out my project! This is still in very early development and it's barely a game! Everything is still being refined so! I would really appreciate everyone's thoughts about the game and what you wish me to add or change!

If you wish to fund this project or get builds of this game faster than anyone else, please check out my Ko-fi and Patreon!

Description: You're a serial killer and for some reason, a cute ghost is haunting you. Though, things get a little bit difficult when the anniversary of your first kill comes around. 

What to expect

* Four routes
* Six Endings
* Three Bad Ends
* Two Good End
* One True End
* Custom art
* Voice acting

Credits

* Route One/Bad end 1 and 2 - Me

* Route Four/Good nd 2 - AliasDT
